data.system_settings: Windows 10 Creators Update x64, Latest stable discord for windows.
data.actual_result: Goes back into the channel message box
data.expected_result: Shouldn't go back to channel message box
data.short_description: Able to get back into message box and edit it (channel-textarea-inner in CTRL+Shift+I) while the send file gui (modal-container same thing in inspect element ) is open
data.steps_to_repro: - Step 1: Type something into the channel message box but dont send it - Step 2: Drag and drop or select an image from discords uploader (Dont send it) - Step 3: Press CTRL+Z while in the gui and it should bring you back to the message box without closing the uploader gui etc
